subtitle: A deliciously sticky alternative to drumsticks. The chicken and spare ribs marinate in the sticky sauce until you're ready to barbecue.

method.text: Using a sharp knife, slash the chicken wings through the thickest part of the meat.
In a shallow dish, combine the marinade ingredients. Add the chicken and spare ribs. Spoon over the marinade. Leave in the fridge for at least 1 hour.
Place the wings and ribs on a preheated barbecue. Cook for 20 min, turning and basting frequently until cooked.

title: Sticky ribs and wings
